jobs.title: Junior Web Developer
jobs.description:
LHH Recruitment Solutions is looking for a Junior Web Developer will play a pivotal role in enhancing the customer experience on the D2C website and eCommerce site. This dynamic position involves hands-on work with a high-performing eCommerce team. You will be responsible for building, managing, and analyzing A/B tests to optimize the user experience.

Position is Hybrid, Direct Hire/W2, and it... is Full Time in San Bernardino County location. RELOCATION SUPPORT provided.

Apologies, this client isn't able to offer VISA or any other kind of sponsorship/transfer.

Key Responsibilities:
• Develop and implement customer-facing website features, adhering to UX best practices and business goals.
• Apply modern frontend development techniques, ensuring code quality, maintainability, and cross-browser compatibility.
• Contribute to the eCommerce product roadmap by identifying opportunities for improvement and aligning them with company objectives.
• Lead A/B testing initiatives on the website, utilizing customer data to form hypotheses, conduct tests, analyze results, and iterate based on findings.
• Write A/B tests using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
• Identify and address user journey pain points with data-driven, strategic recommendations to enhance the customer experience.
• Collaborate with developers, designers, and marketing teams to prioritize and implement UX and customer journey improvements.
• Monitor and report on website KPIs, providing actionable insights.
• Manage multiple projects from planning to execution and delivery.

Qualifications:
• Preferred: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related discipline, or equivalent hands-on experience.
• Skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and knowledgeable in frontend frameworks/libraries such as React or Vue.js.
• At least 1 year of experience managing high-growth Shopify Plus storefronts, with effective collaboration with design and engineering teams.
• At least 1 year of experience working with A/B testing and personalization platforms like Dynamic Yield, VWO, or Google Optimize.
• Strong grasp of UX/UI principles and best practices.
• Proficient in using analytics tools such as GA4, Hotjar, and Content Square.
• Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, capable of explaining technical concepts to non-technical audiences.
• Strong organizational and project management skills.
• Demonstrated understanding of user needs and a commitment to improving their digital experiences.

Expected salary range: 80,000k -120,000k
• standard PTO
• 40k
• standard medical, dental, and vision

jobs.title: WEBAPP DEV - Web Developer
jobs.description:
Position Summary

This position is the Senior Specialist within the Commercialization IT organization accountable for the planning, delivery & operations of web content management platform capabilities and any associated integrations with other internal or external systems in support of marketing goals & objectives to enhance customer experience...

The individual will primarily partner with the WCE & IT cross functional teams, to plan/deliver on web content management product capabilities that have the greatest impact on the enterprise, work with product manager to execute on expectations, and ensure that product deliverable and resources are appropriately built, tested and deployed to fulfill the intended business outcomes.

Key Responsibilities
• Partner with the IT matrix team with a primary focus on the strategic planning & delivery of the Technical Product (content management systems/publishing platforms), and associated internal/external system integrations and a secondary focus on the enablement and simplification of such capabilities to drive effective customer engagement & experience.
• Support the Product Owner in planning out the product roadmap.
• Assess any requirements and/or product gaps that need to be filled and be a part the roadmap.
• Manage the build, delivery and operations of product features that are being rolled out.
• Monitor the quality & performance of product features in real-time.
• Perform maintenance tasks to ensure the reliability, durability and scalability of automated processes.
• Developing and managing the product test plan.
• Support User acceptance and regression testing of product modules.
• Understand existing product capabilities and stay up to date with weekly rollout of new product features.
• Support channel delivery team with advance site setup or product related questions.
• Support analyzing site design needs and help build sample design pages using available product components.
• Proactively identify and troubleshoot. Expert in website code/module debugging and issue analysis.
• Support CSS styles or JS script code for some site-specific functionality and help create user-stories if new enhancement required in existing components.
• Provide recommendation for technology strategy & roadmaps for content management product capabilities.
• Identify opportunities for continuous improvement such as increasing productivity or cost savings.

Qualifications & Experience

Desired Experience
• Strong hands-on experience with Web Content Management tools, specifically Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) with a focus on front-end development. Backend development experience is a plus.
• Hands-on experience with building or authoring AEM websites using templates/components.
• Preferred experience of product management within the healthcare domain.
• Support Product Owner from a technical standpoint to ensure robust product delivery.
• Manage build, test & deployment processes for the product rollouts.
• Manage product QA/UAT/Post PTP testing process.
• Build/Manage effective authoring guide and training videos for product modules.
• Prepare sample page for agencies/channel delivery team for better support when new features and capabilities rolled out on platform.
• Help manage Authoring guide, DesignLab for product authors and come up with creative usage of components to support more design variations.
• Prepare and Manage Product Technical FAQs.
• Support Channel delivery team with site setup activities/Pre-PTP/Post-PTP/Production issues.
• Strong interest in proactive learning and a keen enthusiasm for process optimization.
• Problem-solving skills and the ability to work effectively in a team.
• Attention to detail and a proactive approach to identifying and addressing issues.
• Ability to thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic work environment.
• Excellent attention to detail with the ability to work well under pressure.
• Demonstrated experience in the planning and execution of product capabilities for Digital marketing domain.

Other Experience
• Working knowledge of agile software-development lifecycle methodologies.
• Ability to lead the analysis of complex business needs and translate those into compelling and actionable strategic plans to improve product.
• Demonstrated ability to support a dynamic culture of innovation and continuous improvement.
• Potential to develop into an internally and externally recognized thought-leader in the field of omni-channel capabilities, solutions & services.
• Ability to scan technical landscape for leading edge solutions and create business cases for new investments, including level of effort/ cost required to implement solutions & services, and managing the delivery process.

Required Qualifications
• Bachelor's Degree with 2-5 years of hands-on industry work experience in the websites domain.
• Strong business knowledge with proven digital technology experience.
• Familiarity with agile development cycle and awareness of the Pharmaceutical Industry.
• Capable of working cooperatively across boundaries and within a matrix to achieve results.
• A strong business sense and deep understanding of the digital landscape

jobs.title: Web Developer
jobs.description:
Company Description

USM Business Systems Inc. is a quickly developing worldwide System Integrator, Software and Product Development, IT Outsourcing and Technology assistance supplier headquartered in Chantilly, VA. We offer world-class ability in giving most astounding quality and administrations through industry best practices planned to convey remarkable worth to our customers...

Utilizing our industry knowledge, administration service offering expertise and innovation abilities, we distinguish new business and innovation slants and create answers for help customers around the globe, giving top of the line solid and practical IT benefits which are cost effective services.

Established in 1999, the organization has corner qualities in building and dealing with a Business Oriented IT environment with rich involvement in technology innovation, ERP and CRM counselling, Product Engineering, Business Intelligence, Data Management, SOA, BPM, Data Warehousing, SharePoint Consulting and IT Infrastructure. Our other offerings include modified solutions and administrations in ERP, CRM, Enterprise architecture, offshore advisory services and e-commerce.

USM, a US ensured Minority Business Enterprise (MBE) is perceived as one of the fastest developing IT Systems Integrator in the Washington, DC zone. Most as of late, USM was positioned #9 on the rundown of the Top administrations organizations in the DC Metro Area - Washington Business Journal (2011). We are a project-driven firm that reliably meets the IT needs of our State and Government customers through development and business keenness.

Job Description

Job Description:
Experience with responsive web design utilizing Content Management System (CMS) and Content Delivery Network (CDN) tools that deliver a consistent cross-device experience
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them
Development experience utilizing Microsoft .Net web technologies
3-5 years' experience with Microsoft .NET web-based solutions and development using .NET Framework, Visual Studio 2008/2013, SQL Server, Web Services, Web API
Strong understanding and experience in SQL Server database, query tuning, programming and stored procedures
3-5 years' experience with HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, Java, jQuery, ASP.net, Ajax, C#, image authoring tools, Web Services using JSON and XML, along with experience working with Microsoft Internet Server (IIS)
Solid understanding of Google Analytics, Google Webmaster Tools, and SEO best practices

Additional Information

If my requirement matches your resume, then please do reply on my email id mohammedm@usmsystems(dot)com and contact number 703-880-2641

jobs.title: Full Stack Web Developer (Web Developer (Full stack))
jobs.description:
UITS ENTERPRISE SERVICES (UA-CCSE-IUINA)

Job Summary...

Designs, develops, tests, and configures software systems and computer programs. Consults with stakeholders/clients to review existing software solutions; develops new functionality and/or writes new code as needed. Collaborates with other technical staff and stakeholders/clients to ensure optimum functionality, performance, accessibility, scalability, and security of supported software. Documents software development efforts (changes, new functionality, issue/problem resolution). Follows program module test procedures, generates required test data, and executes testing procedures; performs quality assurance checks and fixes bugs accordingly; works with functional users to diagnose problems encountered during testing and provide production support. Provides documentation, information, and training through formal and informal communications to end users, departments, and internal staff. Adheres to university software development standards and best practices (version control, nightly build systems, test suites, etc.); Researches and stays up-to-date on new industry software development standards, emerging technology, UX/UI design/philosophy, and accessibility standards.

Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Information, or related field. 2 years of experience in the following .NET technologies: .Net Core 5.0, .Net framework (3.5/4.0/4.5/4.6/4.7), ASP.NET or ADO.NET, 2 years of experience in the following web technologies: C, C++, Core Java, Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React JS, jQuery, JSON, HTML 5, Bootstrap, Angular2, PowerShell, T-SQL, AJAX or XML/XSL 2 years of experience in all of the following: DTS, ETL, Creating Jobs, Packages, and Reporting Services (SSRS), Integration Services (SSIS), and Analysis Services (SSAS) on SQL Server Database. 2 years of experience with full development life cycle, including design, coding, testing, and deployment 2 years of experience with knowledge of GitHub and Microsoft TFS. 2 years of experience with at least one of the following: MS Visual Studio, VS Code, or similar 2 years of experience with Cloud Tools 1 year of experience with IIS servers 1 year of experience with containerization tools like Docker. 1 year of experience with Waterfall and Agile SCRUM methodologies with the ability to define, estimate and deliver scope in the determined deadline

Working Conditions / Demands

This role requires the ability to effectively communicate and to operate a computer and other standard office productivity equipment. The position involves sedentary work as well as periods of time moving around an office environment and the campus. The person in this role must be able to perform the essential functions with or without an accommodation.

Benefits Overview

For full-time staff employees, Indiana University offers a wide array of benefits including:
• Multiple plan options for medical insurance
• Dental insurance
• Health Savings Account with generous IU contribution
• Life insurance, LTD, and AD&D options
• Base retirement plan contribution from IU, subject to vesting
• Additional supplemental retirement plan options
• Tuition benefit for IU classes
• 10 paid holidays per year
• Generous Paid Time Off
• Paid Parental Leave
• Employee Assistance Program (EAP)
Learn more about our benefits by reviewing our online Benefits Brochure .

Job Classification

Career Level: Core

FLSA: Exempt

Job Function: Information Technology

Job Family: Web Admin, Design, & Develop

Click here to learn more about Indiana University's Job Framework.

Posting Disclaimer

This posting is scheduled to close at 11:59 pm EST on the advertised Close Date. This posting may be closed at any time at the discretion of the University, but will remain open for a minimum of 5 business days. To guarantee full consideration, please submit your application within 5 business days of the Posted Date.

If you wish to include a cover letter, you may include it with your resume when uploading attachments.

Equal Employment Opportunity

Indiana University is an equal employment and affirmative action employer and a provider of ADA services. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment based on individual qualifications. Indiana University prohibits discrimination based on age, ethnicity, color, race, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, national origin, disability status or protected veteran status. Indiana University does not discriminate on the basis of sex in its educational programs and activities, including employment and admission, as required by Title IX. Questions or complaints regarding Title IX may be referred to the U.S. Department of Education Office for Civil Rights or the university Title IX Coordinator. See Indiana University's Notice of Non-Discrimination here which includes contact information .

Campus Safety and Security

The Annual Security and Fire Safety Report, containing policy statements, crime and fire statistics for all Indiana University campuses, is available online . You may also request a physical copy by emailing IU Public Safety at or by visiting IUPD.

Contact Us

Request Support
Telephone:

Apply for Job
• Staff Positions
• Sign In
• New User
• Enable Screen Reader Mode

jobs.title: Web Developer
jobs.description:
Salary:

A3 Technology, Inc. is seeking an experienced Web Developer to work with our Software Team to support RMLS applications in Egg Harbor Township, NJ. The successful candidate will collaborate with team members in resolving technical issues within the RMLS system, as well as documentation and test solutions...

Essential Job Functions:
• Knowledge and experience in software development and test under agile methodology.
• Develop new features and modifies the structure of existing software products.
• Experience troubleshooting application problems.
• Provide support for the deployment of the applications.
• May be required to support software installation.
• Attend and may lead meetings, design reviews, working groups and briefings.
• Report issues and problems and recommends solutions.
• Perform other related duties in line with tasks assignments.
• RMLS Field Support 24x7 as needed.
• After hours install and support as needed.
• Located at the FAA William J. Hughes Technical Center.

Knowledge, Skills and Abilities:

Required:
• Extensive web development (PHP, .NET, CSS, HTML)
• Database developer background (Oracle/SQL).
• Development experience in Oracle replicated environment.
• JavaScript programming.
• AJAX and Web Services.
• Excellent writing and verbal skills.
• Excellent customer relations skills.
• Ability to work in a team environment and be willing to work together in support of team goals.
• Ability to adapt to an agile environment.

Skills a Plus:
• Extended JavaScript.
• Python.
• Web server-side knowledge (Apache/IIS).
• Full stack web development.
• Model-view-controller architecture.
• Familiarity with object-oriented programming techniques.
• Cross-browser development.

Education:
• Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science or Math or a Bachelor’s degree in another technical field with a minimum of thirty (30) semester hours in a combination of Mathematics, Statistics and Computer Science and (15) years of related work experience in a Computer Science or Math field OR
• Master’s Degree in any field of study with a minimum of thirty (30) semester hours of either undergraduate or graduate study in a combination of Mathematics, Statistics and Computer Science and (12) years related work experience in a Computer Science or Math field.

Additionally, US Citizenship or documented proof of eligibility to work in the US is a must. Upon receiving a conditional offer of employment, candidates will undergo a Government investigation and must meet eligibility requirements for Government clearance. Verification of past employment, education and references is also required. It is imperative that candidates be either a US citizen or a current green card holder with the last 3 consecutive years as a resident of the US.

At A3 Technology, Inc., we take pride in being an Equal Opportunity Employer (EEO) and Affirmative Action (AA) employer. We're committed to considering all qualified candidates for employment without regard to race, religion, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, protected veteran status, disability, national origin, genetic information or any other protected status

jobs.title: Experienced Web Developer Needed for Pixel-Perfect and Responsive Website
jobs.description: I am looking for an experienced web developer to assist me in building a pixel-perfect and responsive website. The candidate should have a strong understanding of Figma, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The main responsibilities will include converting the designs from Figma into well-structured and clean HTML and CSS code, ensuring the website is fully responsive and optimized for various devices and... screen sizes. The ideal candidate should have a keen eye for detail and a solid understanding of UI/UX principles. The project is expected to 1 week and is suitable for an intermediate to expert-level developer

jobs.title: Senior Web Developer
jobs.description:
Remote Job - Senior Web Developer

Are you a Web Developer looking for a remote opportunity to work with a growing digital marketing agency that helps some of the top global life science companies...

Supreme Optimization is looking for a Senior Web Developer with WordPress and Magento experience to help support our growing client base.

About Supreme: We are the world’s first digital marketing agency exclusively for Life Science companies. We combine expert digital marketers, developers, designers and “Ph.D-level” scientific marketers in one team.

Our mission is to be the #1 provider in the world for Life Science and Pharma digital marketing services and resources. This means delivering high quality digital marketing services to our customers so they can better serve their audience.

Role Title: Senior Web Developer

Role Mission: Working with our existing development houses and project managers to maintain, optimize, and improve client websites and to provide clear technical support including minor bugs, monthly maintenance, and content changes via ticketing system and support desk. Keep us in the forefront of technological changes. Someone with a keen interest in automation using ChatGPT.

Key Outcomes for the role
• Monthly maintenance is completed on time and within budget
• Fixes and changes are deployed on time
• Clients love working with you
• Our team loves working with you and can’t say enough good things about you

Key Responsibilities for the role
• Provide custom solutions to client development requests and problems for both WordPress and Magento
• Support our existing development teams by processing minor WordPress and Magento client support requests (including bug reports and ‘how to’ requests)
• Support our Project Managers by client facing to help answer technical questions
• Oversee our central ticketing system for our clients on monthly maintenance
• Work with our Project Managers and DevOps to review existing client websites for development improvements and general optimization
• Encourage technical innovation throughout the agency

Mandatory Skills
• 3+ years of WordPress experience ranging from maintenance, Page Builders (Beaver Builder, Elementor, etc.), manual theme builds, and custom Wordpress development.
• 3+ years of developing and implementing efficient code in PHP/MySQL/CSS/JS
• Have expertise as a frontend/backend developer and be aware of UI/UX design principles
• A good understanding and focus on performance-orientated programming to ensure our websites excel at Page Speed and other usability and conversion metrics
• Proficiency using Git Version Control
• Basic knowledge using command-line tools such as basic SSH Linux server management
• Good interpersonal skills to allow working with Clients and Project Managers to correctly identify and convert requirements and requests into actionable requests

Core Competencies
• Ambitious
• Organized
• Self motivated
• Proactive
• Positive attitude
• Comfortable client facing
• Great communication skills

Nice to have(s)
• Experience with Sanity, BigCommerce, and other API-first SAAS offerings.
• Rudimentary Python experience.
• Magento experience. We work exclusively with Magento as our ecommerce solution
• Technical background / education preferred
• Experience at a marketing or web development agency (not required but a bonus)
• Experience working with Jira and/or Trello
• Visual eye for design vs development
• Experience of automated testing (preferably PHPUnit and Behat/Selenium)
• Experience of using Version Control systems such as Git as part of a team
• Experience working with AWS, WPEngine and their features

Compensation
• Salary: $70,000 -,$90,000 USD/year (based on experience and performance)

If you are interested in applying for this job please do the following:

1) Submit an email to careers at supremeopti.com with the subject line "It’s Alive!"

2) In blue color font, write 2-3 sentences telling us your name, who you are and where you are from

3) In red color font, write a few sentences on why you think you would be a good fit for this job.

4) In black font, let us know about your PHP/MySQL Website, including any WordPress and Magento development background.

Please include the following in a bulleted list:
• Most complex website (include URL) you developed, including coding problems you overcame
• Git repository of any shareable work
• Number of years of PHP/MySQL experience
• Number of years of WordPress development experience
• Platforms and Frameworks you are confident in developing with (e.g. WordPress, BigCommerce, Shopify, Magento etc.)
• Number of years of eCommerce experience
• Number of years of agency working experience

5) Include a link to your Linkedin profile. We do not accept resumes

jobs.title: Web Developer (All Levels) Jobs
jobs.description:
Insight Xcite LLC

Fairfax, VA 22030...

Job details

Pay

$175,000- $275,000.00 per year

Job Type
• Full-time

Benefits
• Employer-paid Health insurance
• Employer-paid Dental insurance
• Employer-paid Vision insurance
• Unlimited Paid time off/Flex Bonus program
• Employer provided 401(k) - no matching requirements, 100% vested day 1
• * Flexible schedule
• * Referral program
• Professional development assistance
• Bonus Pay

Insight Xcite is looking for talented folks who can help us expand our Enterprise Solutions practice. We have Software Developer positions to fill supporting active projects onsite with a client in the Northern Virginia area. The successful candidate will help implement new features for complex, mission-critical, enterprise applications that bring data and features together with innovative user experiences. If this is you, or someone you know, we'd love to chat.

Responsibilities:

-Design and develop solutions to meet Sponsor mission requirements

-Maintain a good understanding of the sponsor’s business needs

-Provide integration support with external systems and data sources

-Define data tables in relational databases and implement business logic

-Customize existing applications, facilitate roll out of new applications and modules, and design and develop application UI, workflow, and API

-Follow an agile software development methodology for planning, implementing, and delivering capabilities

-Implement the full software development life cycle to support the deployment of custom applications

-Provide technical expertise on all technical questions related to assigned development

Required Qualifications

Eligibility
• **TS/SCI With Full Scope Poly Clearance is required***

-Must be legally authorized to work in the United States without the need for employer sponsorship, now or at any time in the future

Web Development

-Development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Java, or developmental language

-Demonstrated experience using relational databases

-Understanding of best practices across both commercial and federal sectors as it relates to workflow and -process management

Communications

-Ability to communicate effectively in a fast-paced environment

-Fully capable with the Microsoft Office suite (Excel, PowerPoint, Word)

Education

-Bachelor’s degree preferably in an IT related field 6 years of related experience; or a Master’s with 4 years of experience; an Associates with 8 years of experience

Desired Qualifications

Web Development

-Experience in scrum and agile frameworks for development to include task management, performing stand-ups and sprint reviews, gathering requirements, and creating documentation

Platform Development

-Experience integrating custom applications with enterprise software and platforms, e.g., SharePoint, ServiceNow, Salesforce, etc.

Communications

-Experience interviewing stakeholders to gather system requirements, estimate the level of effort, develop conceptual designs, and implement solutions

-Ability to develop briefing slides

-Demonstrated experience with project management tools

-Development of reports according to ongoing customer needs

-Demonstrated experience formatting, layouts, coordinate complex text and graphics for management -briefings

What it takes:

-A 'be the best of the best’ attitude

-Hunger to be at the leading edge of your field

-Strong work ethic

-Ability to work in individual or team environments

-Intellectual curiosity along with an analytical mind

Patriotism:

-willingness to work towards the betterment of your countrymen

-desire to be the first line of defense to protect your nation

-passion to protect and serve

jobs.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
jobs.description:
About the Role

We are looking for a full stack developer that can own the GPU marketplace. The primary responsibility will be to take ownership of the bulk of the website, fix bugs and to ship features for both hosts and cloud rental customers. The company is engineering-lead with ample opportunity to grow into senior technical or management roles with time. You will be a core contributor that... allows Vast to scale to millions of GPUs.

Example Projects:
• Migrate a postgres DB from remote RDS to local in-memory
• Create or update automated deployment scripts and unit tests
• Develop a robust local website test setup
• Implement full backend logic and frontend GUI for a new SLA reliability feature
• Convert adhoc logging file output to a modern logging backend
• Quickly investigate and summarize options for new system architectures

You are:
• Comfortable in a variety of tools and languages such as Python, C++, SQL, Javascript, React, CSS
• Capable and willing to quickly investigate and learn new frameworks and tools
• A fan of occasional remote pair programming
• Passionate about building scalable and reliable high throughput websites
• Excited about the potential of AI

Benefits:
• Generous compensation, equity, and benefits
• Join early into a fast growing, ambitious startup
• Opportunity to grow into other technical or management roles

jobs.description:
